name: Infernal Invitation
description:
This is just a very short work in progress of a game idea.  I make comics online with these demon characters and wanted to make a game revolving around them. 

This is done in RpgMaker with the help of yanfly plugins, becauseI have no coding experience. I might shift to a different engine to make this game but for now this is just to help me learn about game design.

Thank you for taking the time to look at my idea.

Pluggins- Yanfly

Sasuke Kannazuki- Svactorposition pluggin
